response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional item that has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. I believe it would greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its high value and quality, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
